title: The Writer's Almanac - Sunday, November 24, 2019
description: Today is the birthday of Indian author and activist Arundhati Roy, who won the Booker Prize for her first novel, “The God Of Small Things.”
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: Today is the birthday of Indian author and activist Arundhati Roy, who won the Booker Prize for her first novel, “The God Of Small Things.”
